channel.title: Illustrator on ERIC WANG
channel.description: Recent content in Illustrator on ERIC WANG

item.title: @MINISTRY OF INTERIOR - How to graphic design at the ministry of interior ?
item.description: At the ministry of Interior and more specically at the Border Police, I produce quantity of infographics to highlight weekly report for the ministry cabinet.

item.title: @CARBONE 4 - How to price carbone ?
item.description: After graduation, I have join a consulting firm Carbone 4, specialised in climate change strategy. One of the three mission is carbone price and its strategic involment for future law applience.

item.title: @SNCF - How to size new line regarding Paris' evolution in 2030 ?
item.description: Internship made at SNCF in collaboration with l'Institut de la Région Île-de-France regarding the impact of 2 new lines of metro, today and in 2030.
